00028 ScenParser::ScenParser(const char* filePath){
00029     try {
00030         xercesc::XMLPlatformUtils::Initialize();
00031     } catch (const xercesc::XMLException& toCatch) {
00032         char* message = xercesc::XMLString::transcode(toCatch.getMessage());
00033         std::cout << "Error during initialization! :\n";
00034         std::cout << "Exception message is: \n" << message << "\n";
00035         xercesc::XMLString::release(&message);
00036     }
00037 
00038     SAX2XMLReader* parser = XMLReaderFactory::createXMLReader();
00039     parser->setFeature(xercesc::XMLUni::fgSAX2CoreValidation, true);
00040     parser->setFeature(xercesc::XMLUni::fgSAX2CoreNameSpaces, true); // optional
00041 
00042     MyHandler2* defaultHandler = new MyHandler2();
00043     parser->setContentHandler(defaultHandler);
00044     parser->setErrorHandler(defaultHandler);
00045 
00046     try {
00047             parser->parse(filePath);
00048             std::vector <VehicleToTrack> result;
00049             //result = defaultHandler->vehicles;
00050             //defaultHandler->showVehiclesToTrack(result);
00051         } catch (const xercesc::XMLException& toCatch) {
00052             char* message = xercesc::XMLString::transcode(toCatch.getMessage());
00053             std::cout << "Exception message is: \n" << message << "\n";
00054             xercesc::XMLString::release(&message);
00055         } catch (const xercesc::SAXParseException& toCatch) {
00056             char* message = xercesc::XMLString::transcode(toCatch.getMessage());
00057             std::cout << "Exception message is: \n" << message << "\n";
00058             xercesc::XMLString::release(&message);
00059         } catch (...) {
00060             std::cout << "Unexpected Exception \n";
00061         }
00062 
00063         delete parser;
00064         //delete defaultHandler;
00065 
00066 }
